title: Autophagy markers LC3 and p62 in aging lumbar motor neurons
details: S Jahanian, M Pareja-Cajiao, HM Gransee, GC Sieck… - Experimental Gerontology, 2024
abstract: Autophagy is a ubiquitous process through which damaged cytoplasmic structures are recycled and degraded within cells. Aging can affect autophagy regulation in different steps leading to the accumulation of damaged organelles and proteins …
